reviewText: Again, a second DVD I purchased from this vendor has proved to be just as promised.  A professional transaction, goods as promised and quick as lightning.  Highly recommend.

Finding Chewin' the Fat videos on the USA is not an easy task.  Fortunately, I took a chance of looking on Amazon and found this vendor.
My DVD arrived quickly, in perfect condition, and is just hilarious (vendor has not control over content, I realize, but wanted to say how very much I've enjoyed watching and re-watching it and playing it for others).  Will repeat as I find other titles of interest.  Highly recommend.
This selection of comedy skits is excellent however I would like to see it on DVD format, is this available? Amazon has the best selection of CD's and DVD's I have ever seen.
